body: What is the difference between k/d and the pvp k/d?
body_tagged: What is the difference between k/d and the pvp k/d?
title: K/D and PVP K/D

replies.body: I think K/D includes world deaths while the PVP K/D only includes deaths by players
replies.body_tagged: I think K/D includes world deaths while the PVP K/D only includes deaths by players

replies.body:
K/D KILL PER DEATH
pvp K/D Kill per PvP (You was killed) death
replies.body_tagged:
K/D KILL PER DEATH
pvp K/D Kill per PvP (You was killed) death

replies.body:
KD = Kill death ratio (all deaths)
PVP KD = Kill death ratio (Player deaths)
replies.body_tagged:
KD = Kill death ratio (all deaths)
PVP KD = Kill death ratio (Player deaths)
